resources.string: Your well-being is important; we are here for you.

After beginning we need to take a test.\nData we collect: By completing the initial questionnaire, we collect basic info (age, education, interests) and responses about your emotional well-being to personalize your experience and suggest relevant activities.
Tell me how you felt today
This is your space, write however you want

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: How often have you been upset because something happened unexpectedly?
How often have you felt unable to control the important things in your life?
How often have you felt nervous or stressed?
How often have you successfully dealt with irritating life hassles?
How often have you felt that you were effectively coping with important changes happening in your life?
How often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
How often have you felt that things were going your way?
How often have you felt that you could not cope with all the things you had to do?
How often have you been able to control the difficulties in your life?
How often have you felt that you had everything under control?
How often have you been angry because things that happened were outside of your control?
How often have you found yourself thinking about all the things you still have to do?
How often have you been able to control how you spend your time?
How often have you felt that difficulties were piling up so high that you couldn’t overcome them?
I can roll with the changes.
How often have you felt unable to control the important things in your life?
How often have you felt nervous or stressed?
How often have you successfully dealt with irritating life hassles?
How often have you felt that you were effectively coping with important changes happening in your life?
How often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
How often have you felt that things were going your way?
How often have you felt that you could not cope with all the things you had to do?
How often have you been able to control the difficulties in your life?
How often have you felt that you had everything under control?

resources.string: You have finished the test successfully, please swipe right to see your results
Whoa!\nYour results show you\'re handling things really well right now—that\'s awesome!
Hey, I see some things might feel a bit heavy right now
It sounds like things might feel overwhelming right now

It looks like you might be facing some tough challenges right now. Remember, resilience is like a muscle that gets stronger with practice. We\'re here to help you build it step by step. Try our guided activities to start growing your inner strength!
You have a good foundation of resilience! There’s always room to grow, and we can help you strengthen your skills even more. Explore our tools to handle challenges with greater confidence.
Wow, your resilience is impressive! You have strong skills to navigate challenges. Keep nurturing this superpower—our advanced resources can help you shine even brighter.
Great news! Your results are good. Keep using our app to maintain your mental well-being—explore activities to stay strong and positive!
Your feelings are valid, and it’s okay to seek support. Consider talking to a trusted adult or mental health professional. Meanwhile, our app offers calming tools to help you cope—you’re not alone.

Please consider to reach out to a mental health professional or trusted adult soon—they can provide important support. Our app has emergency resources and calming exercises to help while you connect with them. You deserve care.
Something went wrong, please try again
Let\'s look up a new article!

Every time you write in your gratitude journal, you add to your streak of days, allowing you to unlock fun games. Gratitude is associated with increased happiness, reduced depressive symptoms, and greater overall well-being.\nFeel free to write
Tell me. How do you feel today?
This user already exist, please sing in.
